SEARCH
Package model.placementArea

Class PlacementArea

java.lang.Object
model.placementArea.PlacementArea
public class PlacementArea extends Object
the placement area for every player (where you put the card you are playing each turn)

    • addCard

      public int addCard(Coordinates xy, PlayableCard card) throws CantPlaceCardException
      adds a playable card to the placementArea of turnPlayer returns the number of points granted by the playable card
      Parameters:
      xy - coordinates to add a card in
      card - the card to add
      Returns:
      points earned when placing the card
      Throws:
      CantPlaceCardException

    • canBePlaced

      public boolean canBePlaced(PlayableCard card)
      This method checks if a given card can be placed based on its constraints.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be placed.
      Returns:
      TRUE if the constraints limiting the card placement of the card are satisfied, else returns FALSE. If there are no constraints or the card is not facing up, the card can be placed and the method returns true. If constraints are present, it checks if the available elements satisfy the constraints. If not, it returns false.

    • tuiCanBePlaced

      public boolean tuiCanBePlaced(PlayableCard card)
      performs the same control as the previous function except for the fact that it checks the placement constraint even if the card is turned
      Parameters:
      card -
      Returns:

    • verifyObjective

      public int verifyObjective(Shape shape, List<Element> element)
      Counts the occurrences of a shape objective. Returns zero if an error occurs during the computation
      Parameters:
      shape - the shape of the objective to be verified
      element - the list containing the elements in order corresponding to the cards of the objective
      Returns:
      the occurrences of the shape "shape"

    • testWrapper

      public Coordinates testWrapper(Coordinates xy, PlayableCard card) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method is a wrapper for the private method updateAvailablePlaces. It takes in a Coordinates object and a PlayableCard object, and calls the updateAvailablePlaces method with these parameters. This method is primarily used for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      xy - The coordinates where the card is to be placed.
      card - The card to be placed.
      Returns:
      The coordinates removed from the list of available places.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the coordinates are not contained in the availablePlaces list.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getAllArtifactsNumber

      public HashMap<Artifact,Integer> getAllArtifactsNumber()
      returns the number of every artifact visible in the PlacementArea
      Returns:
      a Hashmap containing the couples (artifact, numberOfThatArtifacts)

    • getAllElementsNumber

      public HashMap<Element,Integer> getAllElementsNumber()
      returns the number of every element visible in the PlacementArea
      Returns:
      the Hashmap containing the couples (element, numberOfThatElements)

    • getNumberNearbyCards

      public int getNumberNearbyCards()
      counts the number of corners covered by the newly placed card
      Returns:
      the number of surrounding cards (whith respect to a card that has just been placed)

    • getDisposition

      public HashMap<Coordinates,PlayableCard> getDisposition()
      This method returns the current disposition of cards on the placement area. The disposition is represented as a HashMap where the keys are the coordinates of the card's position and the values are the PlayableCard objects placed on those coordinates.
      Returns:
      A HashMap representing the disposition of cards on the placement area.

    • getAvailablePlaces

      public List<Coordinates> getAvailablePlaces()
      This method returns a list of coordinates representing the available places on the placement area where a new card can be placed.
      Returns:
      A List of Coordinates representing the available places on the placement area.
